name: Jump Test
description: This is the second installment in the "Learning Series" where I just make games with a new feature last time it was collision and movement, and this time it is jumping. The controls are "right arrow key to move right, left arrow key to move left, and up arrow key to jump". There is a bug where sometimes you get stuck in the ground after jumping, so to get out of that, just jump and move until it stops.
